creator: joelsherriff@comcast.net
text:
if "Page 1" redirects to "Page 2" and "Page 1" has follow redirects 
and "Retrieve all embedded resources..." enabled, the embedded resources 
for "Page 2" are not downloaded.

creator: joelsherriff@comcast.net
text:
Found the cause for this bug - the "Host:" field isn't updated correctly so 
that if a subrequest is sent to an address other than the main page's address, 
the server may reply with Not Found.

Fixed in 2.1 branch for the Auto Redirect case (was already working for follow
redirects)
creator: sebb@apache.org
